Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class PlayerBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.PlayerBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class PlayerBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Board used by each player to keep track of his points, damages, cubes and every other detail needed to proceed during the game.
    Author:
    Stefano Formicola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:
        collection of the player's damage points

      • appendDamage

        public void appendDamage​(PlayerColor color,
                         java.lang.Integer n)
        This method is responsible for adding damages to the player board and checking the correctness of the parameters.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the player's board and character who inferred the damage
        n - number of damages inferred (can't be negative)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the same color of the player is asked to be added to the array or the number of damages is less than zero

      • getMaxPoints

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getMaxPoints()
        Maximum number of points that other players can get by killing a player
        Returns:
        a list of Integer that corresponds to the list of maximum number of points other players can get by killing a player

      • getMarks

        public java.util.List<PlayerColor> getMarks()
        Returns the collection of the player's marks
        Returns:
        collection of the player's marks

      • setMarks

        public void setMarks​(java.util.List<PlayerColor> value)
        This method is responsible for setting marks to the player board and checking the correctness of the parameter.
        Parameters:
        value - collection of the player's marks
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the same color of the player is asked to be added to the array

      • addMarks

        public void addMarks​(PlayerColor color,
                     java.lang.Integer value)
        This method adds marks to the player board and checks the correctness of the addictions.
        Parameters:
        color - it's the color of the marks to add
        value - it's the number of marks to add

      • death

        public void death​(boolean finalFrenzy)
        A method responsible for resetting the board, changing the maximum number of points and wiping out damages or marks.
        Parameters:
        finalFrenzy - it's true if the game is in final frenzy mode.
